content: the scarf the pumpkins are going to be black with orange or purple as the background ** work chart 1 from row 48 to row 1 then work chart 2 from row 59 to row 1 work chart 1 from row 52 to row 51 break orange yarn join purple yarn to work chart 1 from row 50 to row 1 then work chart 2 from row 59 to row 1 break purple yarn knit 2 rounds with black yarn then bind off single_crochet cast on edges and bind off edges closed or use kitchener stitch to graft them and add fringe if desired chart 1 siouxsiestitches com chart 2 siouxsiestitches com
